term.title: synoptic scale

item.text: In meteorology, the size or scale of ordinary weather systems or cyclones; typically 1000 km horizontally.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2217 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
